DOC.brief_summary: This study will test the effectiveness of face masks and hand cleaning in preventing the spread of influenza within households
DOC.brief_title: A Randomised Controlled Trial of Face Masks and Hand Hygiene in Reducing Influenza Transmission in Households
DOC.detailed_description: Randomised controlled trial of surgical masks and alcohol hand wash among approximately 6069 Hong Kong residents who have a household member diagnosed with influenza. Influenza in index member and secondary infection will be documented with rapid influenza tests and PCR. Minimal risk to participants.
DOC.criteria: Member of family with influenza infected member Age less than 2 yr
